# LFMM ridge with bootstrap assuming $V$ (`r Sys.Date()`)

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, cache = TRUE)
```

## Run on normal model 

$$G = mu + U V^T + X B + E$$

```{r normal}
library(Article3Package)
library(tidyverse)

K <- 3
s <- NormalSampler(n = 100,
                   L = 1000,
                   K = K,
                   prop.outlier = 0.2,
                   sigma = 0.2,
                   c = 0.6,
                   mean.B = 0.0,
                   sd.mu = 1.0,
                   mean.mu = 0.5)

dat <- sampl(s)
plot(dat)
```


```{r exp}
CompGenerativeModel(dat = dat, s = s, K = K, boot.rep = 50, exp.rep = 5)
```
